name: Flashmob
description:
Entry for the Games Jobs Live Game Parade Spring 2021.

Unfortunately we didn't have much time or resources to dedicate to the jam in time for submission, and mostly did it for fun.

We will keep working on it, if you want you grab the latest build from here:

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1_K8NvRx4LsiHvX41ZFN_KPTMMOI3T7px?usp=sharing
